code: import React from"react";import Register from"./Auth/Register";import Login from"./Auth/Login";import{LOGIN_MODAL,SIGNUP_MODAL}from"../store/actions/type";import{connect}from"react-redux";var MODAL_COMPONENTS={LOGIN_MODAL:Login,SIGNUP_MODAL:Register};var ModalContainer=function ModalContainer(props){if(!props.modalType){return null;}var SpecificModal=MODAL_COMPONENTS[props.modalType];return React.createElement(SpecificModal,null);};var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{modalType:state.modal.modalType};};export default connect(mapStateToProps)(ModalContainer);
